# Voice Chat

Wilderion servers have **Simple Voice Chat** ‚Äî voice communication right in the game!

---

## üé§ Features

- **Proximity chat** ‚Äî voice is heard in a radius around you
- **Groups** ‚Äî create private and public channels
- **Unlimited distance** ‚Äî communicate through channels at any distance

---

## üì• Installation

:::warning Mod Required
You need to install the mod on your client for voice chat to work!
:::

### Step 1: Install Fabric

1. Download [Fabric Installer](https://fabricmc.net/use/installer/)
2. Run and select your game version
3. Click "Install"

[Detailed guide](https://fabricmc.net/wiki/install)

### Step 2: Install Fabric API

1. Download [Fabric API](https://modrinth.com/mod/fabric-api) for your version
2. Place the file in the `mods` folder

### Step 3: Install Simple Voice Chat

1. Download [Simple Voice Chat](https://modrinth.com/mod/simple-voice-chat) for your version
2. Place the file in the `mods` folder

---

## ‚öôÔ∏è Configuration

After installation, press **V** (default) to open the voice chat menu.

### Main Settings

| Setting | Description |
|-----------|----------|
| **Microphone** | Select microphone |
| **Speaker** | Select output device |
| **Voice Activation** | Voice activation or push-to-talk |
| **Mute** | Disable microphone |
| **Deafen** | Disable sound from others |

### Hotkeys

| Key | Action |
|---------|----------|
| **V** | Open menu |
| **Caps Lock** | Push-to-talk (default) |
| **M** | Mute/Unmute |

---

## üë• Groups

Create groups to communicate at any distance:

1. Press **V** to open menu
2. Go to "Groups" section
3. Create a new group or join an existing one

### Group Types

| Type | Description |
|-----|----------|
| **Open** | Anyone can join |
| **Normal** | Password required to join |
| **Isolated** | Members only hear the group |

---

## ‚ùì Troubleshooting

### Voice chat doesn't work

1. Make sure mod versions match the server version
2. Check that Fabric API is installed
3. Check microphone settings in mod menu
4. Make sure microphone is not blocked by system

### Can't hear other players

1. Check that you're not in "Deafen" mode
2. Make sure volume is not at zero
3. Check that other players are within hearing range

### Others can't hear me

1. Check that microphone is selected correctly
2. Make sure you're not in "Mute" mode
3. Check voice activation indicator
